name: getElementRequired
snippet: <fmxmlsnippet type="FMObjectList"><Step enable="True" id="141" name="Set Variable"><Value><Calculation><![CDATA[JSONGetElement ( $scriptParams; "{{elementName}}" )]]></Calculation></Value><Repetition><Calculation><![CDATA[1]]></Calculation></Repetition><Name>${{elementName}}</Name></Step><Step enable="True" id="72" name="Exit Loop If"><Calculation><![CDATA[Let ( $error = error.Set ( 958 ; "Missing/invalid parameter: {{elementName}}" ; "Parameter check" ) ; IsEmpty ( ${{elementName}} ) )]]></Calculation></Step></fmxmlsnippet>
